code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{fetchAdminData,fetchUserDetailsAction,approveEventAction}from'../../../../features/admin/adminActions';import{selectAdminDashboardData,selectUserDetails,selectAdminLoading,selectAdminError}from'../../../../features/admin/adminSelectors';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminDashboard=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const dashboardData=useSelector(selectAdminDashboardData);const users=useSelector(selectUserDetails);const loading=useSelector(selectAdminLoading);const error=useSelector(selectAdminError);useEffect(()=>{dispatch(fetchAdminData());dispatch(fetchUserDetailsAction());},[dispatch]);const handleApproveEvent=eventId=>{dispatch(approveEventAction(eventId));};if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error: ",error]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Admin Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Event Submissions"}),dashboardData&&dashboardData.events.map(event=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:event.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleApproveEvent(event.id),children:"Approve Event"})]},event.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"User Accounts"}),users.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[user.name," - ",user.email]})},user.id))]});};export default AdminDashboard;
